attributes.action: Modify the E-Petitions page so that users can register a negative signature (vote against) to establish real public opinion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Looking through the petitions it is easy to see what people are passionate about, however, the U.K. is a democracy so allow people whose opinion goes against that of the petitioner, to affect a signature "against" the stated cause.

rejection.details: This issue is dealt with in the FAQs http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/faq
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
